message: Let's split the money evenly. I suggest we each take $6000 and $4000 respectively.
You're lowballing, I'm not going for it. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think this is the last offer I'll make.
I believe an even split would be fair. Both of us should receive $5000.
I'm still not convinced an even split is the best option. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
Considering the inflation, I propose a division where I receive $5500 and you receive $4500. This balances out the decrease in value for you.
You're trying to adjust for inflation, but I think you can do better. I'm willing to give you a decent chunk, but don't expect me to go easy on you.
I understand your concerns about inflation. In this proposal, I am offering you $4200 and I will take $5800. This maintains a fair balance considering the decreasing value of money.
